reason:
DEPENDENCY DECLARATIONS REMAIN ABSENT DESPITE PREVIOUS CHALLENGE RESOLUTION.

The previous challenge ch-c394be9c29e (resolved) noted that Node 1.4 uses results from Node 1.1 (commutation identity) and Node 1.3 (test vector choices) without declaring formal dependencies. The node text was amended to include 'DEPENDENCIES: Node 1.1 (commutation identity), Node 1.3 (test vector choices W = W^circ, V = V^circ for ramified pi)' in the body, but af deps 1.4 still returns 'No dependencies.' The textual acknowledgment is a partial fix, but the formal dependency links should be registered so that taint propagation and dependency tracking work correctly. Additionally, the inference type remains 'assumption' though this node performs a derivation/computation from prior results.
